str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Probably contracted from tessares and peze; a table or stool, usually for food; also a counter for money.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
From thrao; a stately seat; by implication, power or a potentate.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Twelve; the usual way in which the Twelve apostles of Jesus are referred to. From duo and deka; two and ten, i.e. A dozen.
A tribe or race of people. From phuo; an offshoot, i.e. Race or clan.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.
